transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Hanji.
Executive: Hanji main Rajesh bol raha hun RJ Enterprises se.
Customer: Kahan se sir?
Executive: RJ Enterprises. Achcha achcha achcha haan ji sir kaise hain sahi hai wo wale number pe call kiya na isliye pata nahi chala mujhe.
Customer: Haan haan haan. Ji bataiye.
Executive: Mere ko ek portal pe ek enquiry aaya tha lekin wo close down ho gaya lekin wo pinara hi likha hua hai ek bar fir se pakka hai.
Customer: Haan ek minute rukiye main check kar raha hun.
Executive: Ye direct enquiry aaya tha sir ya wo mail pe aaya tha?
Customer: Nahi nahi wo isme dekh raha tha jo ye hota hai na buylead.
Executive: Buylead pe.
Customer: Purchase karne ke liye ja raha tha to close ho gaya dikha raha hai.
Executive: Achcha ek minute dekhiye sir rukiye.

Executive: Haan kis location ka buylead tha sir?
Customer: Kya cheez?
Executive: Kis location ka buylead tha?
Customer: Pinarai P I N A R A Y I.
Executive: Achcha achcha apne hi location ka tha.
Customer: Haan mera same location mein hai yes sanitary napkin incinerator machine heater right sir?
Executive: Haan. Haan sir haan ji ye actually kya hua sold out ho gaya hai sir isko jaise hi hum log jab click kar rahe honge na to panch log isko le chuke the buylead ko.
Customer: Kitne baje aaya tha?
Executive: Ye aaya tha aapka uh
Executive: Ye 12:31 pe matlab 12:31 pe aaya tha.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Haan to 38 minute baad ye sold out jab aap ise try kar rahe honge wo 38 minutes ke time pe to isse pehle four log le chuke the aapke click karne se pehle hi kisi partner supplier ne isko le liya. Aap ek kam kariye.
Customer: Boliye. Mere ko ye milne ke liye kya karna hai?
Executive: Haan ab IndiaMART khula hua hai aapka?
Customer: Haan ek minute dekhiye. Ji.
Customer: Haan khula hua hai.
Executive: Haan usme buyleads pe jayiyega ek bar.
Customer: Buylead. Haan. Haan buylead mein dekhiyega upar kuch option aa rahe honge usme ek option aayega past karke past.
Customer: Kya cheez?
Executive: Buylead wali screen pe hi upar ke side mein kuch options aa rahe honge waha pe ek option aapko aayega past karke P A S T past.
Customer: Uh relevant recent catalog view uh related past okay. Haan past pe click kijiye dekhiye wo lead dikh rahi hogi pehle number pe na aapko.
Executive: Haan haan haan haan haan haan isme I am interested pe click kijiye ga.
Customer: Ab ye kya hoga ye lead to sold out ho gaya but I am interested pe aap jaise click kar denge to ye system mein aapka message aur feedback save ho jayega to jaise hi ye ya is tarike ki koi bhi buylead turant aati hai to wo priority basis pe aapko turant bheji jayegi system wo aapke kya karega.
Customer: Wo nahi chahiye mere ko ye chahiye ye same same isi se baat karna chahiye wo nahi ho payega na.
Executive: Nahi nahi wo sold out ho gaya sir wo panch hi log le sakte hain buylead ko five people.
Customer: Hmm. Haan ab I am interested pe click karne se next time aisa bhi kuch aayega to pehle aapko priority pe bheja jayega is tarike ka buylead.
Executive: Wo nahi chahiye koi baat nahi.
Customer: Achcha achcha ji sir.
Executive: Theek hai aur kuch ji ji theek hai sir.
Customer: Theek hai. Ji.
Executive: Achcha sir isme hello.
Customer: Haan boliye.
Executive: Haan sir ek cheez aur bas mujhe kehni thi wo last time baat hui thi na thoda sa product hamara score hame badhana tha hamara kya hai abhi jo do product to aapne diye the do product to add ho gaye the but abhi bhi jo total score aa raha hai wo 58% aa raha hai out of 100 hame kya hai kuch details aur add karne ki jaise aapka industrial solid waste incinerator hai iski kuch details thi jo mujhe aap se puchni thi ki capacity kya hai iski sir?
Customer: Kaun sa capacity jaise industrial solid waste incinerator jo hai aapka iski capacity kya rehti hai 23 kg per batch 50 kg per batch 100 kg per batch.
Executive: 100 kg. 100 kg per batch ho gaya aur solid waste incinerator ho gaya iska type aur power source kya hai diesel gas electrical.
Customer: Industrial solid waste nahi nahi iska jo power power source hai na sir matlab diesel se chalta hai gas se ya electrical se. Diesel diesel diesel.
Executive: Diesel se aur theek hai ye industrial waste ke liye hai na ye?
Customer: Haan. Executive: It is for industrial waste. Haan industrial industrial okay okay made in India sir. Haan haan. Okay got it sir abhi iska score hamara 70 ho gaya hai out of 100 abhi isme photos wagera main ek do aur laga dunga details dal dunga to iska hame har product ka 80 to 80 se upar rakhna hai to wo main kar deta hun ye details mujhe pata nahi thi product to last time add kar diya tha maine ye mujhe nahi samajh mein aa raha tha isliye aap se pucha.
Customer: Theek hai. Executive: Theek hai sir thank you sir. Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer's buylead was already sold out.

- Wants to talk to the same person.

- Wants to know how to get the buylead.

- Wants the same buylead.

- Needs to increase product score.



Resolution:

- Executive explained the buylead was already sold.

- Executive explained how to check past buyleads.

- Executive explained about I am interested feature.

- Executive asked for details about the product.



Next Steps: 

- None



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, sold out, product details, score
